reviewText: Pam Anderson is great good movie

i watched this movie along time ago and always liked it.
And on Amazon you can get just about anything you want so I bought it.
Returned. Was not able to get the tape to work.  Something was wrong with it and we had to return it.

The acting and plotting of this film is just plain boring and pretty terrible. If however, you like to see Pamela Anderson's fantastic body (I do, but it doesn't matke a film), then you'll get something out of this. The T&A is highly enjoyable, but untimently this film feels pointless.
